[Desc]               <pink>Susan is twenty six year old woman who at long last is out on her own living her own life and doing as she pleases.  Susan isn't very tall at 5 feet 2 inches and though in her twenties still gets carded regularly and is rather sensitive about it. She wears an expensive red silk suit, high heels, expensive jewellery and has her long blonde hair fashionably styled in long waves to make herself appear more mature. She is here at this gameshow for the prize money which she plans to use as seed money to start her own tech company.</pink>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>Susan now appears to be a helpless little schoolgirl. Her dreams of starting her own company and being taken seriously as an adult are a thing of the past. Full of despair she starts crying and has to be led from the stage by the hand.</pink>;

[short]               2 inch heels;
[STAGE] 2;
[tf]               Susan totters a bit as the heels of her shoes decrease in height again and go from 2 inches to 1/2 an inch. Wearing almost flat shoes she tries standing on her tiptoes to look taller.;

[short]               nearly flat pumps;
[STAGE] 3;
[tf]               Susan settles as the heels of her shoes completely disappear leaving her in flats. She gives up trying to stand on her tiptoes and just stands there.;

[short]               flats;
[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               Susan looks down and sees her flats suddenly changing color and texture until they are black and glossy like patent leather.;
[status]               Susan is wearing a pair of black patent leather flats.;
[short]               black patent leather flats;
[STAGE] 5;
[tf]               Susan's shoes change again. This time a bit of leather forms at the side and stretches across the top of her foot forming a strap which goes into a silver buckle on the other side. Susan recognizes these as mary janes, the classic schoolgirl shoe.;
[status]               Susan is wearing a pair of black patent leather mary janes.;
